title: Avalon TV
overview: Avalon TV is an off-the-wall, over-the-top, and under-the-wig series that takes you inside the brains of LA's hottest creative collective, The House of Avalon. Whether it's fashion, nightlife, drag, art, comedy, or media – this chosen family is creating one iconic pop culture moment after another, and skyrocketing to success by their own set of rules.
